review: Excellent Amazon Fire TV. Unfortunately, the remote control got defect, it can consume up the battery in few hours.  I talk to Amazon Customer support, they are super helpful and they give me two options and I took an option to receive 30% off instead of resend the Unit back because I got the Unit all setup. Overall great experience and value.Only small things that Amazon Fire TV is too new, it does not have a lot of Apps. But I do see more apps coming.
author: Amazon Customer

review: A few issues but they were related to our Kindle Fire. Resolved thru the use of the "mayday" feature and now both the Kindle Fire and the Fire TV work great.
